entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 11:53 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Snow Grains
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
